casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Rimmer, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Rimmer (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 48.]

(No. 98-1092 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided December 2, 1998.) Gregory A. White, Lorain County Prosecuting Attorney, and Lisa A. Locke Graves, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Carl E. Rimmer, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
